mpylib Package¶

Classes¶

MNode([node, node_type, name])
purpose:Provides object oriented interface for querying/editing DAG or DG nodes inside Maya.
MShape(shape)
purpose:Base class for shape node related funtionality. Single instance of
MTrans([node, name]) Provides object oriented interface for querying/editing DAG nodes inside Maya.
MNodeList([nodes]) List type object, used for storing MNode type objects
MShapeList([nodes])
purpose:List type object, used for storing MShape type objects
MTransList([nodes])
purpose:List like object for storing and interacting with multiple transform nodes.
MUndo(func, *args, **kwargs) Wraps a call to the given python function in MEL so it occupies a single undo slot.
